post:
Hi guys, well, thought rather then having these drives just sit in my server doing absolutely nothing may as well get rid of them. 

<pre>
4x Seagate 73GB 15K SAS (can't remember part number and they are just sitting out of lock position on the server)
3x Western Digital 500GB SATA2 WD5002ABYS
</pre>

They are all used, but still all work perfectly fine. 

Location: Datashack, Kansas City, Missouri.

Options:
<pre>
1) if you have a Colo there (or dedi, you may need to ask them if they will put your own drives in) and want them they will provide free remote hands on my side to remove them etc.

2) Send to you. You will need a Prepaid Shipping label (and probably a box to put them in) and they will send them off to you. just pay for shipping

3) Go pick them up if you're local.
</pre>

Price: Well... Free.. can always pay if you'd like but they are FREEEEE..
